rules: Use white background for cards to contrast with light grey app background
Headers inside cards should use caption style (uppercase, mono)
Dense layout: Minimize whitespace inside data cards

gantt.container_class: w-full h-[calc(100vh-12rem)] border border-slate-300 bg-white rounded-sm overflow-hidden
gantt.header_class: bg-slate-100 border-b border-slate-200 h-12 flex items-center px-4 font-mono text-xs uppercase

forms.input_class: h-10 rounded-sm border-slate-300 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-offset-0 focus:border-orange-500 font-mono text-sm
forms.label_class: text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500 mb-1.5 block

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-sm px-6 h-10 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide text-xs transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-300 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-400 rounded-sm px-6 h-10 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide text-xs transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.action: bg-orange-500 text-white hover:bg-orange-600 rounded-sm px-6 h-10 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide text-xs shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-sm px-4 h-9 font-medium text-xs uppercase tracking-wide transition-colors

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-sm p-5 flex flex-col relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-slate-300 transition-colors

badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-sm px-2 py-1 text-xs font-mono font-medium ring-1 ring-inset

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-wider border-b border-slate-200 h-10 px-4 text-left
tables.row: border-b border-slate-100 hover:bg-slate-50/50 transition-colors h-12 px-4 text-sm text-slate-700 font-medium

textures: Use subtle noise texture opacity-5 on dark backgrounds
Use dashed borders for 'Draft' or 'Pending' states
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for refined look. Size 16px or 20px standard.

login_bg.usage: Full screen background with multiply blend mode overlay

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use flat solid colors.
Use 1px borders everywhere. The industrial look relies on clear separation.
Data density should be high. Do not use excessive padding in tables.
All dates must be formatted in monospace font.
Use uppercase text for all labels and headers (text-xs uppercase tracking-wider).
Interactive elements must have a cursor-pointer.
Scrollbars should be thin and styled (slate-300 thumb).
Always check contrast. If using orange text, ensure it is dark enough (orange-600) on white.
Use 'recharts' for charts with custom tooltips (no default shadow).
instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'gantt-task-react' for the Gantt chart functionality.
Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors and font families defined here.
Create a layout wrapper 'DashboardLayout' that includes the sidebar and topbar.
Ensure the 'Login' page uses the industrial background image provided.
